title: Let's be honest guys.
body:
I don't care if kids will main him.
I don't care about the hate he will get from  adc mains.

http://i.imgur.com/z5r9eJ5.jpg



This art is fucking sick. 
Probably the best champion splash art for me now.
Good job whoever made it.


EDIT : Ionian champion are so fcking cool in terms of their look  design {{champion:238}}  {{champion:39}}  {{champion:103}} {{champion:498}}  {{champion:497}}  {{champion:157}}  {{champion:202}}  {{champion:98}}  {{champion:43}}  {{champion:64}}  {{champion:134}}  {{champion:110}} {{champion:77}}  {{champion:11}} {{champion:84}}  {{champion:85}}   they all look really cool

replies.body:
You'd be surprised how many people would hate on this for "anime" and "edge".

Wasn't aware edgy anime held the monopoly on the power struggle between a man and a living weapon market. Smh.

The trope of the cursed object corrupting the hero with the promise of power is as old as fantasy (The Ring in Lord of the Rings?!), heck even antique mythology at some point. I think the market is a bit oversaturated, that's my view on it.

> [{quoted}](name=Speedweeb,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0xP41yFp,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2017-06-28T12:32:39.486+0000)
>
> The trope of the cursed object corrupting the hero with the promise of power is as old as fantasy (The Ring in Lord of the Rings?!), heck even antique mythology at some point. I think the market is a bit oversaturated, that's my view on it.

Nah, I don't have any problem with that trope.

I have a problem with this "too cool and awesome and badass" attitude. Really badass characters don't have that attitude, they don't need to announce how cool they are or wear the armour with most spikes in the shoulders they can find, because in fact they don't give a fuck about their reputation. 

This Kayn is an edgy fashion victim that tries too hard to look evil more tan anything; Jhin handles the "I'm so fucking cool and psyco" much better.

Jhin isn't cool.

HE.IS.ART.
Jhin is the kind of guy who screams at you for liking comics instead of fine arts
I think the shoulder spikes are part of Rhaast's corruption unless i'm misinterpreting things
Doesn't really explain why Kayn can't wear a sleeveless shirt.
B/c he has abs and the ladies need to know. Obviously.
I'm not a lady and I needed to know.

Honestly, I think he's _meant_ to come across as an edgelord, kinda gives him a "he's way over his head" vibe.

Plus, his personality ain't really all that edgy. He's not very happy about killing Shen or Zed, and seems to have a disdain for Noxian brutality.
My favourite self-deprecated edgelord must be Reaper, Kayn can take a seat.

I like the idea that an impetuous and arrogant youth with a big mouth is actually strong for once. The stoic badass that doesn't announce themself is fine and all, but sometimes we need the loudmouth that is actually as strong and skilled as he says he is.
So we can see them get stabbed by an equally loud mouthed scythe.
And Sion gives not fucks about his look. He's too busy tearing skulls from spines.
The dude has a a fking crown as his jaw, he's badass.
In his defense the spikes are only on the side that I assumed rhaat (if thats his name) has taken over
Rhaast, missing an S :p
thnx knew i was missing something
Dude c'mon. I can hear him talking Japanese just by looking at the picture

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0xP41yFp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-06-28T12:16:05.824+0000)
>
> You'd be surprised how many people would hate on this for "anime" and "edge".
> 
> Wasn't aware edgy anime held the monopoly on the power struggle between a man and a living weapon market. Smh.

I was wondering whether or not that anime they're all furiously talking about and referring to is called Warcraft3: Frozen Throne.
the living weapon really isn't what's anime about him. it's pretty much everything else.
You can thank Somnicidal for this one (with support from the rest of the illustration team as usual)  High fives to him, because this was a challenging one to nail  and boy did he nail it :)

Are you planning to fix the placement of his nipple on his model? It looks so painful and weird seeing where his nipple is placed compared to where ours are typically located... Unless that just comes with being a bad ass reaping man.
Yes, that weird nipple is the source of his power.

> [{quoted}](name=Frozen Sovereign,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0xP41yFp,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2017-06-28T21:40:53.022+0000)
>
> Are you planning to fix the placement of his nipple on his model? It looks so painful and weird seeing where his nipple is placed compared to where ours are typically located... Unless that just comes with being a bad ass reaping man.



http://www.webcontemporary.com/tattoo/wp-content/uploads/half-sleeve-tattoo-design-for-men.jpg

that's pretty much about right though.

I like Rhaast personally. I think it's safe to assume that Darkin are now officially the "demon" race of LoL, so I find him quite enjoyable. His impatient and at times sassy attitude towards Kayn is really funny.
We have demons like Tahm Kench and Nocturne though.
Does Kindred count?
Spirits.

"Same difference"

Until proven otherwise.
Love his wit lol
That nip
people have nipples and no it isn't wierd.

It's the implication that guys can show nipples in art while women can't.
If only ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

> [{quoted}](name=Milodic Mellodi,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0xP41yFp,comment-id=000500000001,timestamp=2017-06-28T16:30:14.269+0000)
>
> It's the implication that guys can show nipples in art while women can't.
> If only ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

I am offended and feel the males in this game are over sexualized having to always show their chest, while others like Miss Fortune can't show their nipples. EIther put a bra on Kayn or free miss fortune ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
That is a cultural thing. People view boobs as sexual. Take it up with the culture?
Lol if only. Do anything about that and feminists will be all up in your grill for days XD
Not really just feminists. Feminists if anything go the other way and say women shouldn't have to cover up their chests.

And badly written ones give dumb reasons to show it. 

Like power girl's decision to make a boob window on her chest instead of taking the emblem. She could have just said no and walked away.
soul edge? is that you?

The character is edgy af
and he has a skin named soulhunter

Illuminati.
but not soul eater?
Ya gotta be careful with the copyright man... (Although a Soul Eater inspired skinline does sound interesting...)

believe it or not... copyright isnt as powerful as some people make it out to be. most of those things are generic. copyright really only protects patents for the most part.

exact combinations though are still limited, but you have to have very very very specific descriptions. otherwise there will be loopholes.

> [{quoted}](name=BLACK REALM GOD,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0xP41yFp,comment-id=00000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-06-28T13:47:44.790+0000)
>
> believe it or not... copyright isnt as powerful as some people make it out to be. most of those things are generic. copyright really only protects patents for the most part.
> 
> exact combinations though are still limited, but you have to have very very very specific descriptions. otherwise there will be loopholes.

I still have nightmares about "Worse Company".

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0xP41yFp,comment-id=000000000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-06-28T14:52:38.082+0000)
>
> I still have nightmares about "Worse Company".

Sociology major in the house
It would only be appropriate to lane him against Demonblade Tryndamere

> I don't care about the hate he will get from adc mains.

Because all adc mains are bad people and only adc mains are people who complain.
more or less
Udyr is Freljordian now, not Ionian, at least if I remember correctly.
